responses.probe_1_recursion: Less food reaches the city, so prices go up and some people can't afford to live there.
responses.probe_2_representation: A bicycle has two wheels, a frame, pedals and a chain. When you push the pedals, the chain turns the back wheel and moves you forward.
responses.probe_3_compression: A chef restores order and structure to a chaotic kitchen.
responses.probe_4_ambiguity: I would start by observing how work currently flows through the company and talking to a few people in different roles to see what they call 'the system'.
responses.probe_5_overload: I'd fix the urgent bug, then handle the emails, then prepare the slide deck, and schedule the calls and appointments between tasks.

notes.info: Example raw response file for ApeTest v0.1.
